name: Women's Day Illustrations
description:
The Streamline team is committed to making illustrations that represent women. Many of the world's best designers like Tobias Van Schneider, Khoi Vinh, recommend Streamline!


Check us out at streamlinehq.com.


Use cases:

  1. Pitch decks and presentations
  2. Infographics
  3. Onboarding screens
  4. Apps
  5. Email campaigns
  6. Podcast covers
  7. Websites and blog pages
  8. Social media posts
  9. Educational material
  10. Videos
  11. Ads
  12. Packaging


We aim to add 2 files on Figma each week. See past issues.
